mapper.insert: insert into tbl_member (member_id, member_password, member_gender, member_name, member_email, member_phone, member_agree_privacy, member_agree_marketing) values (#{memberId}, #{memberPassword}, #{memberGender}, #{memberName} , #{memberEmail} , #{memberPhone} , #{memberAgreePrivacy}, #{memberAgreeMarketing})

insert into tbl_member (member_id, member_password,member_name,member_phone, member_email,address_id, member_agree_privacy, member_agree_marketing) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{memberPassword}, #{memberName} , #{memberPhone} , #{memberEmail}, #{addressId}, #{memberAgreePrivacy}, #{memberAgreeMarketing})
